trends.name: Obesity Drugs
trends.description: The shift toward oral delivery and expansion into non-obesity indications like addiction are significantly broadening the total addressable market for GLP-1s.
key_catalysts: FDA approval of oral GLP-1 formulations for weight management
Potential expansion of clinical indications into addiction treatment
Strategic price reductions to capture high-volume market share in China

trends.name: Nuclear Renaissance
trends.description: The nuclear sector is transitioning from a legacy utility play to a high-growth tech enabler driven by the massive energy requirements of the AI revolution.
key_catalysts: Surge in AI data center power demand requiring 24/7 carbon-free baseload
Institutional validation through ARK Investment's entry into SMR developers
Global technological shift toward Small Modular Reactors (SMRs) for decentralized energy

trends.name: Crypto Bull
trends.description: Massive institutional capital deployment is shifting market dynamics from retail speculation to structural supply scarcity.
key_catalysts: Institutional inflows into XRP ETFs exceeding $1 billion
Bitmine's $1 billion Ethereum staking creating supply squeeze potential
Political support and CBDC evolution increasing mainstream legitimacy

trends.name: AI Revolution
trends.description: The AI sector is transitioning from speculative hype to structural consolidation through massive capital deployment and refined user-centric features.
key_catalysts: High-value M&A activity and strategic partnerships (Nvidia/SoftBank)
Continuous product refinement and personalization (OpenAI)
Expanding integration into governance and professional workflows

trends.name: Quantum Computing
trends.description: The shift toward miniaturized quantum hardware is intensifying the global technological arms race and lowering barriers to commercial integration.
key_catalysts: Miniaturization of quantum processors to chip-scale
Geopolitical competition for quantum supremacy between US and China
Increased strategic R&D investment in hardware infrastructure

trends.name: Space Economy
trends.description: The space economy is shifting from exploration to a competitive commercial race, driven by 2026 mission pipelines and aggressive Chinese private sector growth.
key_catalysts: High volume of scheduled commercial and scientific missions for 2026
Rapid scaling of Chinese private aerospace competitors like LandSpace
Technological innovation in satellite sustainability and orbital debris management

trends.name: Cybersecurity
trends.description: The professionalization of cybercrime, including insider threats from security experts, is creating a trust crisis that mandates a shift toward Zero Trust architectures.
key_catalysts: Rise of professionalized insider threats and rogue security personnel
Increased supply chain vulnerabilities in high-tech manufacturing
Massive-scale data breaches driving urgent regulatory and corporate spending

trends.name: Reshoring
trends.description: Heightened security risks and logistics vulnerabilities are intensifying the strategic shift toward domestic production and localized supply chains.
key_catalysts: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities in overseas manufacturing hubs
Supply chain disruptions and cargo theft risks
Consolidation of domestic building material supply chains

trends.name: CeDeFi RWA Infrastructure
trends.description: Integration of centralized compliance with decentralized protocols to tokenize and trade all real-world asset classes. This 'Exchange of Everything' model aims to provide institutional-grade liquidity to previously illiquid assets.
key_catalysts: Launch of All InX platform
Regulatory clarity on RWA tokenization

trends.name: Regional Bank PE-Recapitalization
trends.description: Private equity firms injecting massive capital into regional banks to drive consolidation and scale in specific geographic corridors. This trend focuses on creating high-performing regional hubs to compete with national giants.
key_catalysts: OceanFirst/Flushing merger
Warburg Pincus strategic investments

trends.name: Digital Inclusive Housing Finance
trends.description: Leveraging digital platforms to provide mortgage and housing credit to underserved populations in high-growth emerging markets. This narrative combines fintech efficiency with social inclusion to drive real estate expansion.
key_catalysts: Digital infrastructure maturity in India
Nifty 26,000 milestone
